statements: SELECT * FROM CurriculumData;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT program_id, program_description FROM CurriculumData;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_name LIKE 'Computer%';
SELECT program_id, program_name, LENGTH(program_description) AS description_length FROM CurriculumData ORDER BY description_length DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT program_id, program_description FROM CurriculumData WHERE program_name IN ('Science', 'Math', 'English') ORDER BY program_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_courses;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM curriculum_courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT campus_name, campus_city, campus_country FROM campus_locations;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT campus_name, campus_country FROM campus_locations WHERE campus_city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM curriculum_courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM curriculum_courses WHERE course_credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_credit_hours DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, campus_name FROM curriculum_courses JOIN campus_locations ON curriculum_courses.course_id = campus_locations.campus_id;
SELECT * FROM campus_locations WHERE campus_country = 'USA';
SELECT DISTINCT campus_city FROM campus_locations ORDER BY campus_city ASC;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_data;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM curriculum_data WHERE program_type='Graduate';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_data ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM course_data WHERE program_id=1;
SELECT program_name, campus_name FROM curriculum_data ORDER BY campus_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, campus_name, program_type FROM curriculum_data WHERE program_type = 'Undergraduate';
SELECT program_name, campus_name FROM curriculum_data WHERE program_type = 'Graduate';
SELECT * FROM student_data WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM course_data WHERE program_id = 1 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_data ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campus;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM curriculum_program WHERE program_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM course ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT campus_name, campus_location FROM campus WHERE campus_capacity > 100;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM curriculum_program WHERE program_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM curriculum_program WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_start_date FROM curriculum_program WHERE program_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM course WHERE course_duration > 5 ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM campus WHERE campus_capacity >= 100 AND campus_location LIKE '%New York%';

SELECT program_name, campus_name FROM curriculum_program JOIN curriculum_assignment ON curriculum_program.program_id = curriculum_assignment.program_id JOIN campus ON campus.campus_id = curriculum_assignment.campus_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE program_id = 'abc123';
SELECT program_name, campus_location FROM curriculum_programs;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email, campus_location FROM teachers WHERE campus_location = 'Campus A';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT * FROM courses JOIN curriculum_programs ON courses.program_id = curriculum_programs.program_id
SELECT course_name, program_name FROM courses JOIN curriculum_programs ON courses.program_id = curriculum_programs.program_id
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email, campus_location FROM teachers
SELECT student_name, student_email, program_name FROM students JOIN curriculum_programs ON students.program_id = curriculum_programs.program_id
SELECT * FROM enrollments JOIN students ON enrollments.student_id = students.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id
